PARAM.name: clock
PARAM.description: Sets the clock frequency used by the device

PARAM.name: uart
PARAM.description: Sets the Baud used by the hardware UART for debugging and System Input/Output

PARAM.name: slip
PARAM.description: Sets the IP Address for this device. layer for the SLIP TCP/IP Stack

PARAM.name: IP Address
PARAM.description: Sets the IP Address for this device. layer for the SLIP TCP/IP Stack

PARAM.name: Port
PARAM.description: Sets the Port this device listens on

PARAM.name: Emulation
PARAM.description: Sets the type of slip connection emulation type

PARAM.name: Duplex
PARAM.description: Sets the duplex of the Slip communications. Full duplex allows packets to be sent and received simulataneously. Half duplex waits for full packet to be received before sending a packet

PARAM.name: packetsize
PARAM.description: Sets the size of the slip packet. Smaller packets are sent faster but don't contain as much information.

PARAM.name: adc-port
PARAM.description: Configures the Analog to Digital Ports of the device

OPTION.description: AN7=A AN6=A AN5=A AN4=A AN3=A AN2=A AN1=A VREF-HIGH=VDD VREF-LOW=VSS
AN7=D AN6=D AN5=D AN4=D AN3=D AN2=D AN1=D VREF-HIGH=VDD VREF-LOW=VSS
